reviews.review: Camped frequently, connection errors from the server that cause me to lose items and then give ME a DC timer of five minutes. Developers seriously need to pay closer attention to the players and stop releasing new DLC if they aren't going to focus on the core game.
very fun and easy to learn

Let me start off with the biggest con of this game:

Dead by Daylight has absolutely the worst community out of any online game I have ever played (and I used to be both a devout Overwatch and League of Legends player).

That being said, I can't stop coming back to this game. It's the only game in the asymmetrical horror/survival genre that really nails it. Every other feels like it tried to be "Dead by Daylight but," or "Dead by Daylight with..."

The killers are fun and varied. Survivors are all effectively just skins beyond a certain point. Games are generally pretty brief, and typically a lot of fun. Sure, you run into instances where the killer simply targets you all game and you don't get to play, but there are also plenty of games where you survive just by the skin of your teeth and feel the adrenaline pumping. It's those close-cut games on both sides that keep me coming back. There's a lot of room to sort of play how you want as both survivor and killer, and the variation in playstyle keeps the game from getting stale.

this game sucks ass, it doesn't matter if you are a killer or survivor main. if you are a killer main, i'm sorry to say that half of the killers are completely useless and have been nerfed to the ground and are only present for behaviour to steal the money from your wallet. also when you queue, its like the game constantly puts you against survivors who play together and not randoms so you do not have the slightest bit of chance to keep the generators from being activated unless you use certain perks but if you use a killer that isn't meta then you will still lose. and if you are a survivor main you do not have a chance unless you play with either friends or you are a king of not touching grass. this game is a complete grind but what did they decide to do? they nerfed all the perks that allowed you to make a substancial amount of bloodpoints so the grind is completely fucked. serioulsy don't buy this game but imma keep playing it because i gotta compensate the shit ton of money i put into this game.

é um jogo divertido quando se é novato, quando o tempo vai passando e você consegue ver que a empresa só está preocupada em lançar cosméticos para jogo ao invés de consertar bugs que estão no game desde o lançamento(2016), o jogo perde a graça e você perde a empolgação de jogar com os amigos. Eu amo muito esse jogo, mas abandonei por achar que realmente não vale a pena jogar.
A empresa esta cagando para os jogadores de killer, só trazem skin, não arrumam bugs.

jogo cheio de bugs, desbalanceado, sem muito esforco dos desenvolvedores em querer resolver, hitbox quebradas, mecanicas pouco funcionais e bastante estressante. um jogo que poderia ter um competitivo interessante, mas pouco aproveitado e parecendo nao ter muita solucao, perks que sao ops demais, oferendas que sao ops demais, itens e addons que sao ops dms, deixando o jogo cada vez mais desbalanceado e aos poucos sendo mais desinteressante. sem contar os tunellings e campers, em que a desenvolvedora nao arranjou nenhuma solucao para o tal e deixa o jogo cada vez mais cansativo e angustiante

Ive had a ton of matches and the killer usually just gets everyone down on the floor first so no one can escape and then just picks us all up one by one after. So if you try leaving because you dont want to wait around and be killed then you get a ban for however many minutes. I bought this game around halloween on sale as well as friday the 13th and even though friday the 13th isn't getting any updates or more addon content it still is more playable and fun than this game. Plus the whole play 5-10 dollars a DLC for a new killer and survivor thing is just stupid. why should you have to pay even more money to unlock the full game? 1/5 stars

Ich würde dieses Spiel eigentlich empfehlen aber mittlerweile durch die ganzen Änderungen der Perks und die die noch auf das spiel zukommen habe ich persönlich schon keine lust mehr das spiel zu spielen, die killer sind nur noch am tunneln oder kampen, die überlebende perks werden so verschlechtert das es sich nicht mehr lohn überlebender zu spielen. Es ist eine lächerliche sache wie die entwickler dieses spiel zu grunde richten. Das macht mich traurig, ich habe dieses spiel sehr gerne gespielt.
